# PART1 B
GREEN= "#20BF55"

D_GREEN = interpolate_color(GREEN,BLACK,0.5)
class BBB(Scene):
    def construct(self):
        polar= Square().scale(2).shift(3*RIGHT)
        pol_coord = VGroup(Dot([0,0,0]),Arrow(ORIGIN, 1*UP, buff=0), Arrow(ORIGIN, 1*RIGHT, buff=0), color=GRAY_C).move_to(polar.get_center())
        
        self.add(polar,pol_coord)
        CENTER_POLAR =pol_coord.submobjects[0].get_center()
        l1 = Line(CENTER_POLAR,CENTER_POLAR+ 1 * UP).set_color(GREEN).rotate(-30 * DEGREES, about_point=CENTER_POLAR)
                
        rotation_center = CENTER_POLAR
        r_tracker=  ValueTracker(0)
        theta_tracker = ValueTracker(49)
        line1 = Line(CENTER_POLAR,CENTER_POLAR+ 0.7*RIGHT)
        line_moving = DashedLine(CENTER_POLAR,CENTER_POLAR+RIGHT)
        do = Dot(line_moving.get_end())
        mov_fr= VGroup(line_moving,do)

        line_ref = line_moving.copy()
        mov_fr.rotate(
            theta_tracker.get_value() * DEGREES, about_point=CENTER_POLAR
        )
        a = Angle(line1, line_moving, radius=0.5, other_angle=False)
        te = MathTexS(r"\phi").move_to(
            Angle(
                line1, line_moving, radius=0.5 + 3 * SMALL_BUFF, other_angle=False
            ).point_from_proportion(0.5)
        )

        self.add(line1, line_moving, a, te)
        rval= MathTexS("r")
        self.add(rval)
        def my_upd(mob):
            dl= Line(CENTER_POLAR, CENTER_POLAR+ (1+r_tracker.get_value()) * RIGHT).rotate((theta_tracker.get_value()) * DEGREES, about_point=CENTER_POLAR)
            gr= VGroup(dl,Dot(dl.get_end()))
            rval.move_to(dl.get_center()+dl.copy().rotate(PI / 2).get_unit_vector()*0.2)
            mob.become(gr)
        
        line_moving.add_updater(my_upd)

        
        a.add_updater(
            lambda x: x.become(Angle(line1, line_moving, radius=0.5, other_angle=False))
        )
        te.add_updater(
            lambda x: x.move_to(
                Angle(
                    line1, line_moving, radius=0.5 + 3 * SMALL_BUFF, other_angle=False
                ).point_from_proportion(0.5)
            )
        )
        self.play(r_tracker.animate.set_value(1))
        self.play(r_tracker.animate.set_value(0.2))
        self.wait(0.1)
        self.play(theta_tracker.animate.set_value(130))
        self.play(theta_tracker.animate.set_value(49))
